game.name: Sit on bottle
game.shortDescription: "Sit on bottle" - is a game about ordinary factory worker, whose job it is to sit on horizontally laid bottles

reviewHighlights.text: The premise is simple, sit on bottle, spare your anus from fissure. The longer you shield your cornhole from trauma, the more points you accumulate. U...
